text: Olga Tass (née Lemhényi; 29 March 1929 - 10 July 2020) was a Hungarian gymnast. She competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics, in the 1952 Summer Olympics, in the 1956 Summer Olympics, and in the 1960 Summer Olympics. She was born in Pécs. Tass died on 10 July 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian gymnasts Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: Olga Tass
